entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
